org.apache.axis.deployment.wsdd
Class WSDDProvider

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.axis.deployment.wsdd.WSDDProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
WSDDBsfProvider, WSDDComProvider, WSDDHandlerProvider, WSDDJavaEJBProvider, WSDDJavaMsgProvider, WSDDJavaRPCProvider
public abstract class WSDDProvider
extends java.lang.Object

WSDD provider element Represents the liason to the application being exposed as a Web Service. Specific provider extension classes must be registered by namespace URI.

Author:
James Snell
